name: Streamsx.hbase
tagline: Integration of InfoSphere Streams and Apache HBase
body:
### Welcome to the streamsx.hbase toolkit!
This toolkit can help you connect your streams applications to HBASE.  On these web pages, you'll find links to the SPLDoc for both the toolkit and the provided sample applications.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
